author: Flo
content:
Sorry about your rain! Nothing can be as dismal as a gray rainy day in the winter. It's more fun to be out and about when it's snowing - but not blizzarding - just nice gentle huge fluffy white flakes.

Probably a job as a meteorologist is the only job in which you won't get fired for being wrong much of the time, lol!

Now if I were a kid again, I'd want to run right over there and start playing.
